values:
well.. mike is constantly telling me how i need to update this journal thing but my computer hasnt been working and i havent really had anything to say.. but now its working again so this ones for you babe..

this was on someones away message:
Find a guy who calls you beautiful instead of hot, a guy who will lie under the stars and listen to your heartbeat, or will stay awake just to watch you sleep. wait for the boy who kisses your forehead, the boy who wants to show you off to the world when you are in sweats, the boy who holds your hand in front of his friends, who thinks you're just as pretty without any makeup on. The one who is constantly reminding you of how much he cares and how lucky he is to have you..

thats you baby and i love you more than anything in the world.. you're honestly way too good to me.. im sorry for all the times i get upset with you over stupid things.. =(  i love you and thanks for putting up with all my shit.. i love youuuuuuuuuuu =*

today was the first day i got to sleep in in atleast a month.. ohh it feels so good =) and it looks like im gonna get to sleep in on monday too.. yayyyy.. no school today.. but half the day is already gone.. whatever it was worth it to get to sleep.. tomorrow gotta get up early as hell to go to states at seton hall.. and same thing with sunday.. yuckk.. and im only swimming 1 event each day.. how pointless is that?!?! well i gotta go get ready for my job "interview" now.. even though i knowww im getting the job.. just need to find out how much money im getting and sign the contract.. im hoping for atleast $1,750.. if he offers me less than that im not quite sure what im gonna do..

well.. yesterday was shitty.. got a saturday detention in school.. felt like shit.. drove all the way to mikes school to see him.. but ended up having to drive the whole way home alone because i missed the exit he got off on.. then met up with him for all of 15 minutes because he had to go do something.. ended up fighting over how he didnt want to see me that night.. yeh that all suckeddd.. but then i picked dave up and we went out to wendys and then met up with meghan jess and the whole elite crew at a show in montclair.. oh yeh and i cant forget to mention that the place was RIGHT by mike's school where i had just been a few hours before that!! i went through sooo much gas yesterday.. but anyway the show was surprisingly a lot of fun.. what with making fun of the skanking.. and trying to hook mickey up.. [[what an asshole!!]] and then meghan jess dave and i went to some shady diner and ate some food.. yup then i went home and passssssed out cuz i had only got 3 hours of sleep the night before thanks to my lovely english essay.. so then i had to wake up at 7 this morning to go to my saturday detention.. that was HELLLL.. u cant even imagine how boring it is to sit there for 3 hours.. thank god i was "good" and got to leave early instead of staying there for 4 hours.. after that i spent literally an hour in the card store trying to pick out valentines day cards.. and now here i am waiting to go to swimming practice.. ughhh.. and then off to the church to be a waitress.. no clue whats going on for tonight.. i think im gonna go try to take a quick nap.. laterr

alright.. time to update again.. ive still been incredibly busy what with SAT class and stuff.. i had a swim meet saturday.. i swam well i cut a little time off my events.. but i had to stay a lot longer than i had to cuz mrs poppy told me i was swimming in the relay and i wasnt.. ughhh.. sunday i had to take the SAT practice test thing again.. that sucked.. and then i went to mikes house to watch the superbowl.. monday i had SAT class again.. today i had to tutor 3rd graders and im going to swimming practice soon.. my kids were soooo cute.. i love this one girl shes adorable.. yeh so mike is pretty sick and i feel crappy too.. i cant really say im sick just extremelyyyyy tired and my stomach has been hurting for the past 4 days.. wierd.. so it looks like im going on a cruise this summer =) yayyyyy i loveeeeeeee cruises.. only thing is its to like.. norway and crap.. nowhere tropical.. thats honestly no fun.. but cruises are amazing so im trying to be positive about it.. plus i get to go on another cruise to like the caribbean or something spring break of next year.. soo thats amazing.. wow i loveee cruises.. its like a whole city on a boat together.. im just worried its gonna be all these european people that dont speak english =\ haha.. okay time to go eat dinner before swimming.. yuckk all i wanna do is take a napp =(

wow what a crazy week.. haha ive been sooo busy.. well saturday morning i had a swim meet where i swam okay.. then mike and i went to medeival times which was a lot of fun.. then sunday i went out to dinner and a movie w/ mike and my parents.. then monday i went for my drivers test.. had to wait in line an hour and then took my test and passed =) but then went to dmv and found out i didnt have enough id so we had to go home and come back.. of course by then all the computers n shit had stopped worked so i had to wait there for a long period of time.. but finally got my license and got to school.. after school i picked mike up from his school and then we went to white castle and got my car washed.. then we came back to this area and played some pool before i had to go to SAT class.. then yesterday i had an insaneeeeeeee day of last minute mass media taping all day after school.. then had to go right to my swim meet.. after the meet mike and i got cluck u for my family and we all ate it.. then today right after school i had a meeting for tutoring kids at shongum school.. and then i came home and did a shit load of SAT homework before going to my lovely 4 hour SAT class yet again.. ahh sooo tired.. im gonna go to sleep now cuz i need it DESPERATELY

so midterms are over.. they were amazing.. i didnt care about them and didnt study for ANY of them.. it was such a non-stressful week for me.. nice half days and no classes =).. tonight was me and mike's 2 month anniversary.. =D we went to white castle [[yayyy]] and then saw hide and seek [[scary.. but then again the screaming girls in the theater didnt help.. "AHHHHHHHH OMG HE CLOSEd THE LID OF THE GARBAGE BIN AHHHHHHHHHHHH"... yeh not cool]] then we went to the hookah bar where i got to become an angry bitch for the HORRIBLE service we received.. ended up paying $17 for a raspberry hot chocolate and a water.. oh and for the excellent entertainment by the old man with long hair and a beard wearing aviator glasses.. ughhh i wasnt pleased at all.. but yeh i had a great night with my baby.. happy 2 month babe i love you!!!.. tomorrow morning.. or this morning actually.. i have to wake up at 715 to be at motown at 8 for IHC Champs.. yuckkk.. atleast im not swimming anything strenuous =).. and maybe this time ill remember my ipod.. and a pillow and a blanket and lots and lots of food.. then ill be allllll set.. so tomorrow is my cousins 19th birthdayyyy.. yayy happy birthday lindsey.. i love youuuu.. and tomorrow night mike and i are going to a not-so-secret-anymore place to celebrate my birthday.. that should be a lot of fun.. okay thats enough writing for now.. bye bye

yeh soo only 5 more days till my birthday.. and 6 more till i get my license (or go for my test anyway) im soo nervous cuz so much is riding on me actually passing.. like having a ride to school everyday.. and meghan having a ride to school.. and my mom not having to drive me to swimming practice.. and sat class.. and being able to see mike more often.. and ahh so much pressure.. i havent even practiced parallel parking yet cuz theres snow everywhere!! =\ but i think ill be okay.. cuz i just REFUSE to not get my license.. im gonna do everything PERFECTLY.. today was my chemistry exam.. it was pretty hard but i dont think i wouldve done any better had i actually studied.. but whatever its over.. thats a relief.. tomorrow is my english exam which is gonna be hard.. yuck.. and i have to write essays for that class today.. hmm i should get on that.. but yeh after english im pretty much all done w/ my hard exams.. i got my nails done today.. the lady insisted that i put some crazy top coat on it and i think it ended up costing me more but i couldnt understand her.. but its wierd.. it like dried immediately  and my nails are really shiny and hard.. oh well whatever its cool.. ehh swimming practice again tonight.. not so bad cuz ive been swimming better lately.. ok time to go write my essays.. bye bye

well today was the first day of exams.. and we had a delayed opening.. which sucked cuz it meant i got to go in later but i also got out later =(.. so i had school from 9-1 today and i took my history and precalc exams which i didnt study for AT ALL but it turns out i only need a D or better on my history and a F or better on my precalc to get B's for the semester.. so id say im pretty safe.. after that mike picked me up from school and we had lunch and then hung out for awhile at walmart and the like.. then i had swimming practice.. right about now i should be studying for my chem exam tomorrow buttt im not.. because i only need a D on that one too =) oh how i love exams this year.. so yeh my exam doesnt start until 930 tomorrow and i get out at 1120.. veryyy nice.. and then after that i think im gonna go get my nails done cuz theyre in desperate need of some attention.. alright thats enough for one entry..

snowed in all weekend.. it wasnt nearly as big of a deal as every1 made it into.. i had a nice relaxing time.. cept for shoveling today.. no fun there.. this week is midterms.. half days!! yayy.. i think its absolutely hilarious how everyone says they arent gonna study for midterms and that they dont care and yet here they are studying.. i honestly dont care at all.. midterms arent gonna affect my grade at allllll.. therefore i have yet to look over anythingggg so far.. maybe later tonight ill read over my old history tests just because i cant afford to fail.. but thats just about the extent of my studying.. alright time to go get ready to go sledding or something with mike
warning: im a mess lately.. stay away

Go back and copy/paste the first sentence for the first post you made each month over 2004 and post it on your LJ:

January: hmm.. havent written in a really long time (since last year actually!).. well new years eve day was absolutely horrible

February: i keep trying to write in this journal.. but then i 4get that im writing in it and never press enter so it never gets saved

March: so this week is terranovas.. gayest test ever.. its such a joke, i seriously feel dumber the more time i spend taking it

April: well.. tomorrow is the first day of spring break which means im leaving bright n early for washington dc

May: so yeah.. things are OK.. thursday and friday i had field trips which was awesome

June: yeah.. so theres this really really long survey i wanna fill out but im wayyy too tired to do it now

July: umm i dunno what to say... just feel like updating this.. my grandma died yesterday :( 

August: TwElVeR462: sometimes being a good friend is knowing when to say goodbye

September: wow.. i havent written in a longgg time.. hawaii was fun

October: crazy wierd night.. i dont even know how to explain

November: too much drama for me.. its time to put an end to all this shit =/

December: hmm havent written in a week.. lets see whats happened.. we picked up my car wednesday

1: Grab the book nearest to you, turn to page 18, find line 4: push-up pads for maximum cleavage (its a victorias secret magazine.. haha)

2: Stretch your left arm out as far as you can. What do you touch first?: desk

3: What is the last thing you watched on TV?: jets game =(

4: WITHOUT LOOKING, guess what the time is: 12:00

5: Now look at the clock, what is the actual time?: 11:57

6: With the exception of the computer, what can you hear?: music

7: When did you last step outside? about 10 minutes ago when i came home

8: before you came to this website, what did you look at?: my phone

9: what are you wearing?: black guess pants and a white abercrombie shirt

10: Did you dream last night? umm no clue

11: When did you last laugh? when i was with mike

12: What is on the walls of the room you are in?: 3 pictures i made when i was like 8.. a painting of a like farm.. and a shelf of little collectible things

13: Seen anything weird lately?: sure

14: What do you think of this quiz?: its.. different

15: What is the last film you saw?: stuck on you

16: If you became a multi-millionaire overnight, what would you buy first?: a hottt car

17: Tell me something about you that I don't know: umm i theres nothign u dont already know

18: If you could change one thing about the world, regardless of guilt or politics, what would you do?: everyone could eat whatever they wanted without gaining weight.. ahh food :)

19: Do you like to dance?: yes

20: George Bush: ehh hes alright

21: Imagine your first child is a girl, what do you call her?: allison?? i duno its just the first name that popped into my head

21: Imagine your first child is a boy, what do you call him?: gavin

22: Would you ever consider living abroad?: yeah

today was such an awesomely good day.. i had a field trip all day in the city and it was for some odd reason a lot of fun for me.. then i was actually allowed to illegally drive my car to the pasta party.. that made me really excited.. then i went out to dinner w/ my parents for my dad's b-day.. but yeh im EXHAUSTED now.. i had quite a long and eventful night last night lol.. mike somehow managed to put his mom's car on my lawn and we had to wait forever for a towtruck to come.. haha anywayyy im going to sleep.. goodnight everyone

Your New Years Resolution Should Be: Get rid of your "computer butt"
You've got more than "back" - you've got a big, fat ass. And it's probably because you count multiple IM sessions as exercise So, get yourself on the Hacker's Diet, stat... And then you can stop pretending that you're a hot chick in chat rooms.
What Should Your New Year's Resolution Be?
hahahahahah dont take that quiz.. its evil! =(

As we grow up we learn that even one person who was never supposed to let you down probably will. You will have your heart broken, probably more than once, and you'll break hearts too. You'll fight with your best friend, you'll blame a new love for things an old one did, you'll always have that one guy from your past thats going to miss you forever...its ok to miss him too. And you'll eventually lose someone you love, so take too many pictures, laugh too much, make too many memories, and love like you have never been hurt because every sixty seconds you spend being upset is a minute of happiness youll never get back..

..if only it were that easy..

so last night sucked and its hilarious because i sooo called it.. i could just tell something bad would happen.. but later mike and i saw spanglish and things were better.. it was an okay movie.. but dont take my word for it because thats pretty much how i feel about every movie i see.. the only non-comedy movies that ive really really liked recently were the notebook and cold mountain.. i think i wanna buy them actually cuz they were soo good.. so this morning had to be at rutgers at 7 for a swim meet.. and i didnt get to swim until 11 =( it was boring cuz i forgot my ipod and every other person was listening to music so i had no1 to talk to.. figures.. but yeh i swam pretty well cant complain.. but wait heres the best part.. i get to go to rutgers at 7 again tomorrow!! oh yayy maybe this time ill remember my ipod.. im really bored and i really really really really dont wanna do homework.. some1 save me!! i need to get out of this house.. maybe i should like go shower or something so that i can leave.. yeh good idea.. byee
well.... last night was shitty.. hopefully tonight holds better times.. im soo excited.. i love you mike =).. happy new year's eve everyone!!

not in a very good mood.. went to the city with rich yesterday.. it was definitely a good time but it was soo cold out and all i wanted to do was go home and sleep.. so he took me home at 10.. so i get home and i call mike and he says he wants to come over.. but all i really want to do is go to sleep cuz im exhausteddd.. but i agree cuz he said he was leaving where he was soon.. which i (stupidy?) assumed meant he was coming to my house soon.. yeh.. 11:15 rolls around still no call or mike and im still not sleeping.. then he calls and tells me he wants to come over at 11:30.. this is way too late.. by this time im barely awake and very angry that i couldve been asleep for the past hour.. so yes then i eventually get to pass out at 11:30.. and i get woken up at 8 by my mom asking if i would like to go to swimming practice.. no thanks!! ughh and then i couldnt really go back to sleep after that.. now im supposta be going into the city with mike again today.. but i cant wake him up to tell him that we can leave early.. no wouldnt wanna disrupt HIS sleep!!

Watching you walk out of my life does not make me cynical or bitter about love, but rather makes me realize that if I wanted so much to be with the wrong person how beautiful it will be when the right one comes along..

very nice quote.. and so true <33 i love you baby.. and today is the day im stealing everything from erika's journal.. haha ok here i go with the first survey.. i think i took this same one last year..

4. Did anyone close to you die? yes.. uncle rick and grandma =( i miss and love you so much!

6. What would you like to have in 2005 that you lacked in 2004? a drivers license!!
7. What date from 2004 will remain etched upon your memory, and why? November 28th.. <3 mike

i. happier or sadder? same.. maybe a little happier
ii. thinner or fatter? about the same
iii. richer or poorer? richerrr =D
18. What do you wish you'd done more of? spending time with family
19. What do you wish you'd done less of? arguing and being upset about stupid things

23. How many one-night stands? none

25. Do you hate anyone now that you didn't hate this time last year? no.. i dont hate anyone.. but theres people i dont necessarily like so much anymore
26. What was the best book you read? probably one of my astrology books
27. What was your greatest musical discovery? matchbook romance and greenday
28. What did you want and get? a car
29. What did you want and not get? i didnt really want anything else..
30. What was your favorite film of this year? harold and kumar go to white castle and anchorman
31. What did you do on your birthday, and how old were you? i honestly dont remember.. i think i spent it with rich.. and i turned 16

34. What kept you sane? ive gone insane

what a shitty way to spend a saturday night... i had a meet at 6 in princeton and had to be there for warm up at 5.. and before that i went to eat lunch with my parents so i left my house at 3.. then the meet started late and there was technical problems or whatnot so it took forever.. i finally got to swim at like 830 and i swam the 50 free and im so pissed off cuz i definitely think i couldve gotten a 27 cuz i was ahead by soo much the first lap but then i completely missed my turn because it was like one of those floating wall things and i couldnt see where it was.. and then the last lap i caught up a lot and did well for not pushing off the wall and i got a 29 which is amazing for missing my wall.. but im soo pissed off cuz that means i definitely couldve gotten a 27.. arghhhhhh sooo angry.. and then the relay got all messed up and we couldnt find every1 that was supposta be in our relay and then we got in the wrong lane and andrea screamedd at all of us but it was all just a big misunderstanding.. so then i swam horribly cuz i was all stressed out about it and our relay lost by a lot =( so i didnt get out of the meet till 9 and then my parents and i went out for dinner so i didnt get home until 1130.. suckss.. okay i have nothing else to say..
